<!--StartFragment-->

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">设计模式大部分都是扯蛋的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">真正有用的不多</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">广泛应用的更少寥寥无几</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">半同步半异步</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">(<b>Half-Sync/Half-Async</b>)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">正是其中之一</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">一</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">: </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">同步和异步的问题</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">同步</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">: </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">编码简单</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">逻辑清晰</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">, </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">但效率低</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">异步</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">: </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">效率高</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">但结构复杂</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">需处理各种时序和竞争问题</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">对于网络通信来说异步可以避免大量的阻塞</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">提高效率</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">, </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">因此高性能服务器基本都是异步的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:0pt">. </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">但对于业务处理来说异步并没有明显性能优势</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">反而会导致编码复杂</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">于是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Half-Sync/Half-Async</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">便横空出世来解决个问题了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;mso-font-kerning:
